qna.question: Are there alternative options?
qna.answer:
**Short answer:** Yes—there are several ways doctors can try to stop postpartum bleeding before, during, or after an embolization procedure. The best choice depends on how much blood is being lost, how quickly the bleeding is happening, whether the mother wants to keep her uterus for future pregnancies, and how her body is responding to treatment. Your medical team will review all of these factors with you and decide together which option is safest and most effective for your child’s situation.
